summary:
Cleaned up MinUddannelseClient and AgentService:
- Removed unused LoginAsync methods from interfaces and implementations
- Updated MinUddannelseClient constructor to remove global Config dependency
- Added proper argument validation with ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull
- Synced appsettings.json between main and test projects
- Updated test constructor calls to match new MinUddannelseClient signature
- Added Polly package references but removed complex retry logic for now

All builds pass, 973/974 tests pass (1 pre-existing test failure unrelated to changes).
